QuestData.Title: Knowledge is a Terrible Burden
QuestData.Description: Now you know what you're up against, $n. An opponent who no longer knows pain... remorse... or humanity. An opponent who will do anything to get what he wants.$B$BThe heart was his weakness and now he knows you've found it.$B$BIf you're going to go back for it, you'd best bring help. He will not leave it unguarded again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report back to Thassarian aboard the Skybreaker.
QuestData.RewardText: Slow down, $n. Why don't you start again... from the beginning?
